data.message:
WILL,THE GANGSTA SHADY PLEASE COMEBACK?...Shit,why Proof had to die man?..now Slim is not the same,is sad,im really happy because is a live and of drugs,that's is the first,but i really miss the old Slim,The Rain man slim,the How Come Slim,The Slim how make the Anger Management Mix Tape,I MISS HIS OLD BEATS FULL OF POWER AND ADRENALINE,i know that Poof dead change everything,but Proof up there maybe always wished you never change,and by strong,doing this for him and for the fans that always had loved and supported you...Well whatever happens,we will always be with you Marshall,you're our inspiration and the best! (I think you never gonna see this but which does not try, does not win) Inti,from Uruguay.I saw you on MTV as a kid,now i follow you official since 7 years almost 8.

As time passes, things change everyday
But wounds, wounds heal
But scars still remain the same
But tomorrow today's gone down in flames
Throw the match, set the past up ablaze ♪♫
